Message.Title: Eric Schmidt bashes China, so China to fork Android further
Message.Msg: Schmidt bashes China in his new book, so China will retaliate further against Google by forking Android further for its own purposes. China already disallows Google Search and other apps in China in favor of Baidu. In the end, both Google and the Chinese government are in the same business: covert surveillance. Google doesn't appreciate China's co-opting of Android for its own surveillance purpose.

Message.Title: Google's X-Phone (Android 5.0) vs. Samsung Galaxy S4 (Android 4.2)
Message.Msg: X-Phone was leaked today online. Do a search. It'll come with Android 5.0 Key Lime Pie. Samsung's Galaxy S4 will come only with older Android 4.2 Jelly Bean. This is game over for Samsung.

Topic.Title: goog Feb 8th options pains points to 750

Message.Msg: No it doesn't. That's called Max Pain you idiot. That doesn't mean it will get there. Apples max pain was $460. Did it close at $460? No. Go back to school. Keep using iPad apps to invest. See you at $785.

Topic.Title: Cramer said time to take profit

Message.Msg: I think there will be selling on monday. This thing went too fast and cramer is right on this one. Do you think it will still be above 760? I heard the french charged 60 million for links that are showed on its search. If applied to U.S alone it will cost about $1.2B in profits - a ball park estimate

Message.Msg: I think there will be selling on monday. This thing went too fast and cramer is right on this one. Do you think it will still be above 760? Message.Title: Trying to find out if Vanguard is dumping google stock
Message.Msg: I was at an after work cocktail party in Philladelphia last night and I overheard two people talking about how they began selling large blocks of positions in google stock Friday afternoon. I asked the guy at the party who knows everyone there who they were, and he said they were bigwigs at vanguard. I don't know anything else, hoping I can find out if Vanguard was selling Friday. I looked to see the holders of google, and I saw that Vanguard is a holder. I'm a goog holder, but I have only 70 shares ($54,000) I don't want to give any of these gains back. If vanguard is selling, i think I'm in trouble, they are big share holders. Is there a way to find out if they sold on Friday, and are continuing to sell? They can push the price down a good bit.

Message.Title: 'Google it'...I dunno anymore ...I tried Bing and I am impressed, really imressed
Message.Msg: Microsoft taking advantage of the high ground as they integrate PC desktop, smart phone, and pad device technology. Bing works everywhere not just in the browser. I cannot see a bloated Google stock lasting at $775! I seen the same thing years ago when MSFT was over $200. Bloat. I am shorting Google and expect to get a hefty return on a stock that is overvalue by hundreds of percent. My valuation today is - $100, probably settle around $55. Go short it and make yourself a bag, But MSFT at $27 ... I expect it to be over $120 by Independence day.
